meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Linnaea, especially Linnaea borealis, having fragrant pink or white flowers.
meanings.sent1: The twinflower in the garden smelled sweet.
meanings.sent2: I picked a beautiful twinflower for my mom.
meanings.sent3: The bees danced around the twinflower like it was a tiny party.
meanings.sent4: Her smile bloomed like a twinflower in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The delicate twinflower added a touch of elegance to the bouquet.

meanings.definition: A flower that grows in pairs on a single stem.
meanings.sent1: The twinflower on the stem looked like a little pair of twins.
meanings.sent2: She admired the unique twinflower growing in her backyard.
meanings.sent3: The twinflower seemed to be gossiping with its twin on the stem.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was like a twinflower, always together.
meanings.sent5: The twinflower symbolized unity and harmony in nature.
